thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 74 of 625
thread.title: Kacie Rives

author: Kacie Rives
title: Kacie Rives
text: I love the clothes and the web site, however, the time that told me I only had an hour to shop was a bit annoying. I was at work and browsing the web site when I was able to - it made me feel like I was being rushed. After hurriedly finding my items I discovered I my card had been left in my car and I thought I would not receive the first timer discount, but when I signed back on I found it was still there waiting for me. Don't rush your customers! If it wasn't for that pesky timer I would have given this a five star rating.
